title: Dubai City Explorer - 4 Days
description: Discover the modern marvels and traditional charm of Dubai in this comprehensive 4-day city tour. Experience iconic landmarks, luxury shopping, and authentic Emirati culture.

activities.name: Burj Khalifa Experience
activities.description: Visit the world's tallest building and enjoy panoramic views from the observation deck

activities.name: Traditional Souks
activities.description: Explore the historic Gold Souk and Spice Souk in old Dubai

activities.name: Dubai Marina Cruise
activities.description: Scenic boat cruise through Dubai's modern marina district

activities.name: Cultural Heritage
activities.description: Discover Dubai's history at Al Fahidi Historical District

itinerary.title: Arrival & Modern Dubai
itinerary.description: Airport pickup and transfer to hotel. Check-in and rest. Afternoon visit to Burj Khalifa observation deck. Evening at Dubai Mall with dinner and Dubai Fountain show.

itinerary.title: Traditional Dubai Heritage
itinerary.description: Morning visit to Dubai Creek area. Explore Gold Souk and Spice Souk. Visit Al Fahidi Historical District and Dubai Museum. Traditional lunch. Afternoon abra ride across Dubai Creek.

itinerary.title: Dubai Marina & Palm Jumeirah
itinerary.description: Morning at Dubai Marina with walking tour. Marina cruise experience. Visit Palm Jumeirah and Atlantis Resort. Monorail ride. Evening at JBR Beach and The Walk.

itinerary.title: Last-minute Shopping & Departure
itinerary.description: Final shopping at Dubai Mall or Mall of the Emirates. Check-out from hotel. Airport transfer for departure.

fitness_requirements: Basic fitness level sufficient. Involves moderate walking. Suitable for all ages.

altitude_profile.difficulty_level: Easy city tour with minimal walking

booking_info.cancellation_policy: Free cancellation up to 7 days before departure
